bibl.title: Keeping it in the Family: Property Concerns in Eighth Century A.D. Thebes.
bibl.note: Revision of a work presented as part of a doctoral thesis, Individual Scribal Practice at Jeme: The Papyri Documents of Aristophanes son of Johannes (Univ. of Liverpool, 2008). - Introduction: An Overlooked Family Archive. - The Texts. - The Family. - Dating the Texts and the Family. - The Property. - The Church of Apa Patermoute. - Who Compiled the Archive and Why? - Conclusion: Findings from the Archive of Pesynte.
bibl.seg: Jennifer Cromwell, Keeping it in the Family: Property Concerns in Eighth Century A.D. Thebes.

Revision of a work presented as part of a doctoral thesis, Individual Scribal Practice at Jeme: The Papyri Documents of Aristophanes son of Johannes (Univ. of Liverpool, 2008). - Introduction: An Overlooked Family Archive. - The Texts. - The Family. - Dating the Texts and the Family. - The Property. - The Church of Apa Patermoute. - Who Compiled the Archive and Why? - Conclusion: Findings from the Archive of Pesynte.
